title: Geography anatomiz'd, or, The compleat geographical grammar being a short and exact analysis of the whole body of modern geography after a new and curious method / collected from the best authors and illustrated with divers maps by Pat. Gordon ...
author: Gordon, Patrick, fl. 1700.
publisher: Printed for Robert Morden and Thomas Cockerill ...,
